title: conferred on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) 

(Amendment) (No. 2) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 12 May 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited immigration act 2004 (visas) (amendment) (no 2) order 2025 (2) order come operation 12 may 2025

title: conferred on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as
heading: 2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is
text_raw:
2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is 

amended – 

(a) 

in Schedule 1 by the deletion of “Trinidad and Tobago”. 

and 

(b) 

in Schedule 5, by the insertion of “Trinidad and Tobago” after 
“Sri Lanka”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 May, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [164] 3
